Description.Text:
Property Location
Ascott Raffles Place Singapore is in the heart of Singapore, walking distance from Raffles Place and Wak Hai Cheng Bio Temple. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Chinatown Heritage Center and Haji Lane.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 146 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and an elevator (lift).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Ascott Raffles Place Singapore is in the heart of Singapore, walking distance from Raffles Place and Wak Hai Cheng Bio Temple. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Chinatown Heritage Center and Haji Lane.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Raffles Place - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Wak Hai Cheng Bio Temple - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
UOB Plaza - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Thian Hock Keng Temple - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Merlion - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Cavenagh Bridge - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Sir Stamford Raffles Statue - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Victoria Theatre and Concert Hall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Club Street - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Asian Civilisations Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Empress Place Building - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Ann Siang Road - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Masjid Jamae - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Sri Mariamman Temple - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Boat Quay - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Ascott Raffles Place Singapore is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
